name: Bollinger Bands Width
description: Verify band width equals 2 * num_std * stddev
rationale: PRD: Upper = Middle + (k × stddev), Lower = Middle - (k × stddev), Width = 2k × stddev

test_cases.name: constant_price_zero_width
test_cases.notes: Constant price: stddev = 0, so upper = middle = lower

test_cases.name: symmetric_bands
test_cases.notes: Bands are symmetric around the middle (SMA)
